div.p: FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY I'LL BE BACK IN NEW YORK CITY AND
REALITY WILL SET IN. AVERAGE TEMPERATURE IN
CALIFORNIA, 75 DEGREES, SUN OUT EVERY DAY.
IS THAT WHY MANY FOLKS COME TO THE GOLDEN STATE.
THE WEATHER IS SO GREAT, BUT LIFE IS A TRADEOFF.
CALIFORNIA IS A CHAOTIC STATE. FOR EVERY GALLON OF GAS YOU PUT
IN YOUR CAR YOU PAY 68 CENTS TO JERRY BROWN.
SALES TAX, 7.5% AND REAL ESTATE AND PLACES LIKE L.A. THROUGH THE
ROOF. YOU CAN SEE THE TRADEOFF, NICE
BREEZES, SCANT TAKE HOME PAY. LIFE IS LIKE THAT, NO PLACE IS
PERFECT. WE HAVE TO MAKE DECISIONS AND MY
DECISION TO COME OUT HERE IN CALIFORNIA THIS WEEK WAS A GOOD
ONE, BUT YOU PAY A BIG PRICE FOR LIVING HERE.
FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY. CHECK OUT OUR WEBSITE AND WE
WOULD LIKE TO SPOUT OFF FROM THE FACTOR IN FROM ANYWHERE IN THE
